name: Goliath
description:
Kindly be informed that the Goliath game is presently in its Pre-Alpha phase and remains under active development. We are committed to incorporating forthcoming enhancements, which will encompass a variety of game modes, additional maps, and diverse character options.

He was an inevitable wave that washed away all our world’s governing
systems, alliances, and protectors. Our world was no match for a
ruler from the stars with his superior strength and exhaustive
knowledge of our world.

And so our world became his.
Every year since our planet has come under his “protection”,
Goliath hosts a tournament of the best warriors from what few
regions we have left. His hidden agenda is to use these games to seek
out and dispose of any potential threats.

Our goal, as warriors, is to win the tournament for the right to
challenge Goliath and take back our freedom!
